title: Unusual webpage
body: There is a website called rewards riot worlds (something like that, if you google it you will get to the website) that seems like a scam. I have previously posted a discussion about this before but when i went to check it again an Error 404 appeared. Something isn't right. Please investigate this issue.

replies.body:
Riot Games will only host promotions on leagueoflegends.com, lolesports.com, riotgames.com, and at times, woobox. If the promotion is hosted anywhere else, I highly recommend not clicking that link and to reach out to Riot Games Player Support if you have any doubts. For more information on these event phishing scams, check out this post here:

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/8GVrAi62-security-reminder-beware-of-scamsphishing-sites

As to your point about a missing discussion, I don't see any record of it on my end. If you can give me any more information on it, I can look into it!

If the scam webpage its probably a good thing.

If the discussion you posted is the thing not appearing, its likely it was deleted since it may have included the scam link which could not be edited out.
